message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll love. Would you like to purchase it from me for $15000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $10000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $13500. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still a bit above $11500. How about we meet at $14000?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $14000. I'm willing to meet you at $12500. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $13500?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we meet at $13000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $13000, Bob. I think we're at a good spot. How about we finalize the deal at $13000?
